channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Isha Choudhary
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Isha Choudhary

item.title: REGRESSION PROBLEM STATEMENTS
item.description: Project 1 - House Price Predictor-Web App For a normal person, willing to buy a real estate property, it is really important to have a rough estimate about current market situation, prices of the properties based on the localities and other factors. This machine learning projects targets to provide the solution to such problems by estimating the price of a house based on the locality, area in sq. feet, number of bedrooms and balcony.

item.title: CLASSIFICATION PROBLEM STATEMENTS
item.description: Project 1 - Fraudulent Transaction Analysis It is important that finance companies are able to recognize fraudulent transactions so that customers are not charged for items that they did not purchase. In this project I have worked on a dataset having more than 6M rows and 11 features influencing the detection of fraud transactions. I have done pre-processing, feature engineering and scaling down the data and handling the imbalanced and catagorical data to make it model ready.

item.title: DASHBOARD PROJECTS
item.description: Project 1 - FDI India Analysis Project 2 - Employees Data Analysis

item.title: EXPLORATORY DATA ANALYSIS
item.description: Project 1 - Super-Store Sales Data Analysis It is important that the retail stores or retail companies keep track on their sales data and analyse that to find customer needs, trending products, purchase behaviour and many more important attributes about their sales and business to function even better and efficient both commercially and financially.

item.title: About
item.description: Data Science/Analytics and Mathematics are my passion. My name is Isha Choudhary. I am 23 years old girl from India. I have done master’s in Mathematics and was extremely interested in Complex Analysis, Functional Analysis and Numerical Analysis during my studies. I love doing Mathematics and now attracted towards Data Science. I have experience in Operations Analytics and I am extremely interested in excelling into cognitive science like NLP and Computer Vision.
